author: rhuijben
msg: Document the regression in reporting copied on deleted nodes. With
the current state of WC-NG (without 4th tree) there is no way to
fix the regression without guessing for data that was removed by
(assemble_status): Try to obtain copied for deleted nodes.

author: sebb
msg: handle charsets of the form: ContentType: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed

author: slaws
msg: Improve error messages. This validation should happen earlier when the binding is read/resolved rather than when the providers are created. Will look to move it shortly.
